mapper.update: update user_sys_actionlog set actionDate = #{actiondate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actionLevel = #{actionlevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionName = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionid = #{functionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `result` = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, actionDate, actionLevel, content, functionName, functionid, ip, `result`, userId, userName from user_sys_actionlog where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, actionDate, actionLevel, content, functionName, functionid, ip, `result`, userId, userName from user_sys_actionlog
